languages.text: Тело обескровлено и изувечено — то, что некогда было лицом, стало месивом из плоти и осколков костей.

traits.locale_text: Над телом мертвеца явно зверски поиздевались, но крови нет — лишь трупные пятна разливаются на бледной пергаментной коже.

languages.text: The desiccated body is horribly mutilated — what was once a face is now a shapeless mass of flesh and bone shards.
languages.original_text: Тело обескровлено и изувечено — то, что некогда было лицом, стало месивом из плоти и осколков костей.

traits.locale_text: The desiccated body is horribly mutilated — what was once a face is now but a shapeless mass of flesh and bone shards.
The desiccated body is horribly mutilated — what was once a face is now but a shapeless mass of flesh and bone shards.

The desiccated body is horribly mutilated — what was once a face is now a shapeless mass of flesh and bone shards.

languages.text: Le cadavre desséché est affreusement mutilé, et ce qui lui tenait lieu de visage n'est plus qu'une masse méconnaissable de chair et d'éclats d'os.
languages.original_text: The desiccated body is horribly mutilated — what was once a face is now a shapeless mass of flesh and bone shards.

traits.locale_text: Le cadavre desséché est affreusement mutilé, et ce qui lui tenait lieu de visage n'est plus qu'une masse méconnaissable de chair et d'éclats d'os.

languages.text: El cadáver disecado ha sido mutilado de forma espantosa. De la cara solo queda un amasijo de carne y esquirlas de hueso.
languages.original_text: The desiccated body is horribly mutilated — what was once a face is now a shapeless mass of flesh and bone shards.

traits.locale_text: El cadáver disecado ha sido mutilado de forma espantosa. De la cara solo queda un amasijo de carne y esquirlas de hueso.

languages.text: 干瘪的尸体被残忍肢解，原本的脸已经变成了一堆不成样子的肉泥与骨片。
languages.original_text: The desiccated body is horribly mutilated — what was once a face is now a shapeless mass of flesh and bone shards.

traits.locale_text: 干瘪的尸体被残忍肢解，原本的脸已经变成了一堆不成样子的肉泥与骨片。

languages.text: 干からびた死体はひどく切り刻まれており、かつて顔だった部分は、いまや形のない肉と骨片の塊になっている。
languages.original_text: The desiccated body is horribly mutilated — what was once a face is now a shapeless mass of flesh and bone shards.

traits.locale_text: 干からびた死体はひどく切り刻まれており、かつて顔だった部分は、いまや形のない肉と骨片の塊になっている。

languages.text: Der ausgeblutete Leichnam wurde grausam verstümmelt ... wo einst ein Gesicht war, befindet sich nun eine formlose Masse aus Fleisch und Knochensplittern.
languages.original_text: The desiccated body is horribly mutilated — what was once a face is now a shapeless mass of flesh and bone shards.

traits.locale_text: Der ausgeblutete Leichnam wurde grausam verstümmelt ... wo einst ein Gesicht war, befindet sich nun eine formlose Masse aus Fleisch und Knochensplittern.

languages.text: Kuruyup gitmiş ceset, korkunç bir şekilde yaralanmış. Bir vakitler yüzü olan kısmı, biçimsiz bir et kütlesiyle kemik parçalarından ibaret hâlde.
languages.original_text: The desiccated body is horribly mutilated — what was once a face is now a shapeless mass of flesh and bone shards.
